channel.title: [Noble Contest] Noble Rework Pitch(JammySplodge)
channel.description:
>Moreover, we'll be having a contest for NOBLE class rework! Post your ideas @ the "Classes/Lore" section of https://forum.imperium42.com/
Challenge Accepted
# [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** **Noble Gossip(Passive)** - You may speak anonymously with Nobles and Aristocrats at Night, you will not know their identities nor their classes, they will all appear as "Noble" **Royal Blood(Passive)** - You may step up as King **Secret Message(Night)** - Send a secret message to a player - Infinite Uses **Send Servant(Night)** - Send a servant to visit a player, killers will avoid that player in case the servant sees them - 2 Uses
# [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] **[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]** **Noble Gossip(Passive)** - You may speak anonymously with Nobles and Aristocrats at Night, you will not know their identities nor their classes, they will all appear as "Noble", you will hear what the Unseen say but they will not hear you **Royal Blood(Passive)** - You may step up as King **Secret Message(Night)** - Send a secret message to a player - Infinite Uses **Send Maid(Night)** - Send a maid to visit a player, occupying them - 2 Uses

item.title: [Noble Contest] Noble Rework Pitch(JammySplodge)
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
A small note of ‘Servants have the same effective on the affected player as alchemist heal ability’ to which I could then ask the clarification of, ‘Does knight still die if they attack a BD player protected by a servant?’ Would have stopped my questions sooner

Read full topic

item.title: [Noble Contest] Noble Rework Pitch(JammySplodge)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

So then I assume the Knight would still die?

well if we do the obvious thing and look at the fucking wiki we see that it says “Kill a player. If they were an ally, you will instead take your own life.”
This means that if you target an ally with cold steel you’ll die

Read full topic

item.title: [Noble Contest] Noble Rework Pitch(JammySplodge)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I don’t see a yes or a no, which is what the question seeks as a response. Even saying “I’d assume they do still die but I’m not sure” is better than freaking out over a question.

Like I had to answer that myself.

Read full topic

if you want fucking answers then read my fucking replies

orangeandblack5:

I think it’s a good question, especially since Alchemist heals instead of guarding like the King and even you don’t seem to know the answer.

it’s the same fucking thing one of them just doesn’t cure bleeding
death. immunity.
that’s fucking it

item.title: [Noble Contest] Noble Rework Pitch(JammySplodge)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Jammy, you’re kind of going off the rails here.

I think it’s a good question, especially since Alchemist heals instead of guarding like the King and even you don’t seem to know the answer.

Instead of flipping out on somebody, ask Boslof for an answer and provide it or something. This is incredibly cringe-inducing behavior for a moderator to be honest - as much as it sucks, and I will say that this is one reason I never have and probably never will accept to be a mod of anything, you are held to a higher standard than the rest of us because your actions reflect on those of the company you now act as the face of (that being i42). They can’t afford to act like that to people; neither can you.

Now I’ve known you for a long time before you became a mod, and I realize that you in no way mean to personally attack @Moleland here, but not everybody will have past experience with you. People won’t give second chances to those in a PR role, and that’s something that just comes with the territory.

Read full topic

it protects from death like alchemist or physician or king that’s all it does

JammySplodge:

they’re told exactly what they’re told if an alchemist or physician or king of whatever stopped it

or alchemist
jesus christ everyone fucking else got it

item.title: [Noble Contest] Noble Rework Pitch(JammySplodge)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
JESUS FUCKING CHRIST YOU ARE TESTING MY FUCKING PATIENCE MOLE

The mechanic is already in the fucking game you don’t have to give me the fucking third degree

Moleland:

You are a poor excuse for a MOD

says who, hmm?
unless you’ve moderator here you have no fucking right to judge me on that respect

Moleland:

Why bother creating a topic?

if you fucking read the topic you would see my reason at the top of the post

Moleland:

Why not lock the topic?

because i don’t want to lock the topic, I want actually sensible people to comment on my ideas and perhaps give me feedback, what I don’t want is “HURR DURR HOW DUZ DIS MEKANIC WURK” when it’s BLATANTLY FUCKING OBVIOUS HOW THE FUCKING MECHANIC FUCKING WORKS I’VE LITERALLY FUCKING TOLD YOU LIKE FOUR FUCKING TIMES

Read full topic
